overview: An unjust arrest on suspicion motivated artist Bernardo Oyarzún to portray himself as a "criminal", vindicating his indigenous appearance in the face of the racism of Chilean society. His nephew Daniel Díaz, apprentice and heir to the same skin, guides us through an intimate reflection on his uncle's career, narrating in the Mapuche language the reunion with his ancestors.
title: Bajo sospecha: Zokunentu
